Epsilon = 7

```{r include=F}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r echo=F, fig.width=10}
fields = c("Timestamp", "Tag", "appId", "Cores", "Executors", "Epsilon", "Mu", "Partitions1", "Partitions", "Time", "Load")
data_path = "~/Documents/PhD/Research/Scripts/R/R03/nohup08.txt"
maximals = enframe(read_lines(data_path), name = "n", value = "line") %>% select(line) %>% 
  filter(grepl("\\|MAXIMALS\\|", line)) %>%
  separate(line, into = fields, sep = "\\|") %>%
  mutate(Time = as.numeric(Time), Partitions = as.numeric(Partitions)) 
submit = enframe(read_lines(data_path), name = "n", value = "line") %>% select(line) %>% 
  filter(grepl("spark-submit", line)) %>% separate(line, into=paste0("A", 1:14), sep = "--") %>%
  mutate(A3  = str_trim(A3))  %>% separate(A3 , into = c(NA,"Dataset"), sep = " ") %>% 
  mutate(A11 = str_trim(A11)) %>% separate(A11, into = c(NA,"MaxEntries"), sep = " ") %>% 
  mutate(MaxEntries = as.numeric(MaxEntries)) %>%
  separate(Dataset, into=c(NA,"Dataset"), sep = "/LA/") %>% separate(Dataset, into=c("Dataset", NA), sep = "\\.")

data = bind_cols(maximals, submit) %>% select(Dataset, MaxEntries, Partitions, Time)
head(data %>% arrange(MaxEntries), n = 100)

data = bind_cols(maximals, submit) %>% group_by(Dataset, MaxEntries) %>% summarise(Time = mean(Time))
p = ggplot(data = data, aes(x = factor(MaxEntries), y = Time, fill = factor(Dataset))) +
 geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge(width = 0.75), width = 0.7) + 
 theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0 )) +
 labs(x="Maximum entries per node", y="Time [s]", title="Execution time MF algorithm", fill="Dataset") 
plot(p)

data = bind_cols(maximals, submit) %>% group_by(Dataset, Partitions) %>% summarise(Time = mean(Time))
g = ggplot(data = data, aes(x = fct_rev(factor(Partitions)), y = Time, fill = Dataset)) +
 geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge(width = 0.75), width = 0.7) + 
 theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0 )) +
 labs(x="Partitions", y="Time [s]", title="Execution time MF algorithm", fill="Dataset") 
plot(g)
```
